longBusinessSummary: Acropolis Infrastructure Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, consolidation, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to focus a business combination target on the infrastructure, infrastructure services, and related sectors in North America. The company was formerly known as Apollo Infrastructure Acquisition Corp. and changed its name to Acropolis Infrastructure Acquisition Corp. in February 2021. Acropolis Infrastructure Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
